children.subject:
Same there's a surprising lack of clarity or communication. You can register yourself for any commencement ceremonies you want to attend, make sure the Calcentral additional info address you have is correct as they'll mail it to your permanent address or diploma address if specified, I think diploma arrives a few months later.

I also think we have to wait until sometime after the semester ends to act to keep / reobtain our @berkeley.edu emails. I don't know the details on this.

Would also appreciate any and all knowledge under the heading "administrative things related to graduation."

history.content:
You can check that you're on the degree list by looking in your Cal Central, under My Academics, there's a section under your picture, etc about expected graduation. Here's a webpage that discusses almost everything related to graduating for L&S students. LS commencement (Tues, May 17, 2pm @ the Greek) will start registration in Feb, keep an eye out for piazza, email, and FB posts. See here for info about keeping your email address. 

You should do degree checks with your major advisor if you haven't already + your college advisor if you have any questions about completion of degree requirements.

Hi,

I think I added myself to degree list at the beginning of this semester as I will be officially graduating in Fall 2016, but I haven't gotten any confirmation or anything. I don't know what the next step I should do if I want to receive the actual degree/ certificate? When am I expected to get it? Will it be mailed to my house later or something?

Thanks.
history.subject: Added myself to degree list, what now?
